mean_cn: n.薄荷，薄荷糖；造币厂；  v.铸造（硬币）
mean_en: a plant with dark green leaves that have a fresh smell and taste and are added to food and drinks to give flavour, and used in cooking as a herb and to decorate food; a sweet/candy flavoured with a type of mint called peppermint; a place where money is made;  a large amount of money
sentence: Add hot water to mint leaves to make mint tea.
sentence_trans: 热水冲泡薄荷叶就可以做一杯薄荷茶哦。
